channel.title: Christopher Alexander on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: social media metrics / quality without a number
item.description: “To seek the timeless way we first must know the quality without a number. There is a central quality which is the rooted criterion of life and the spirit of man, a town, a building, or a wilderness. This quality is objective and precise, but it cannot be numbered.” Brian Kerr channeling Chris Alexander for a new century and an old industry. Technorati Tags: qwan
